entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Dempster (Highway)
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 22.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending early this evening then mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries near the Ogilvie mountains. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 22. Wind chill near minus 31. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 24.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow and blowing snow beginning in the morning. Light snow near the Ogilvie mountains in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h near noon except gusting to 60 near the Richardson mountains in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 24. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 36 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 23.
entry.summary: Blizzard ending near midnight then periods of light snow. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind east 20 km/h except 60 gusting to 80 near the Richardson mountains in the evening. Temperature steady near minus 23. Wind chill minus 36 in the evening and minus 27 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. High minus 19. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 26. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 26. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 25. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 24 January 2023
